segments.text: From where I'm looking, the window frames a pretty garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the panes, lighting up the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my eyes go straight to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, and water cascades over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see it; she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading at her feet, and she stands in it unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, glancing left, I spot the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, and the boy's raiding it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's on that unstable stool, body stretched tall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could topple any moment, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by holding out her hand expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little conspiracy is kind of cute, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be awful if no one stops it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step in and fix this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast between the tidy yard and this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
